projects.title: Open-Source E-Commerce Engine
projects.description: A high-performance, modular e-commerce engine built for scalability. Features include real-time inventory management, multi-currency support, and a pluggable payment architecture.

projects.title: AI-Powered Analytics Dashboard
projects.description: An interactive dashboard that leverages OpenAI APIs to provide natural language insights from raw CSV data. Implemented a custom RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) pipeline for data context.

projects.title: Remote Health Monitoring System
projects.description: A HIPAA-compliant IoT platform for monitoring patient vitals in real-time. Designed the low-latency websocket architecture to handle thousands of concurrent data streams.
